contact.address: Level 1 53 Sydenham Rd, Marrickville NSW, Australia 2204

booking.booking_instructions: Book your classes online through our PunchPass system or contact us directly
booking.advance_booking: We recommend booking classes in advance to ensure availability

about_us.overview: Marrickville Yoga Centre offers classes suitable for students of all levelsâ€”from beginners to developing, general, and experienced students.
services: Teacher training and professional development programs

delivery.in_studio: Classes are held in our fully equipped, modern, and spacious Marrickville centre.

features: Specialist classes and workshops led by internationally recognised teachers

about_us.history: Marrickville Yoga Centre has been part of Sydney's Inner West community since 2007.

nearby: Public transport including the Sydenham metro line

iyengar_yoga.description: Iyengar Yoga is dynamic, physical, and rejuvenating.
iyengar_yoga.use_of_props: Props are used appropriately to support safe practice.
iyengar_yoga.teaching_style: Teachers monitor students and provide adjustments to ensure effective learning.

about_us.teachers: All teachers are certified by the Iyengar Yoga Association of Australia or are training under Senior Teacher Simon Joannou.
about_us.environment: Our studio provides a welcoming, supportive, and inclusive environment for all students.
